trans-unit.source: Provides access to reference a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference"></xref> class.
Synchronously loads and parses the document specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference.Source*> property location.
If the document has not been loaded previously, GetDocument will load the document regardless if the `forceReload` parameter is `true` or `false`.
If the document was loaded previously and `forceReload` is specified as `false`, the document is not reloaded and the previously loaded document is returned.
If `forceReload` is specified `true`, then the entire document will be reloaded and reparsed, even if it had already been retrieved previously.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to force a new load of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference.Source*> document, even if it was previously loaded.
The document that was loaded.
Attaches a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference"></xref>.
You can attach a document only if it has not been attached to this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference> before.
The document that is attached.
Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for this document reference.
This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference.SourceProperty> field.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A <xref:System.Uri> representing the document reference.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference.Source*> dependency property.
To be added.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
The base URI of the current context.
